travel_tip: For the best experience, try to depart Nashville before 7:00 AM to avoid morning rush hour around the city.

stops.soc_recommendation: Arrive with ~15% SoC. Charge to 80% to comfortably reach the next stop.

food_stops.name: Tikka House
food_stops.description: A local favorite known for its extensive menu and flavorful Indian cuisine.

food_stops.name: Dragon King's Daughter
food_stops.description: Creative fusion of Asian and Latin flavors, offering sushi, tacos, and more.

stops.soc_recommendation: Arrive with ~20% SoC. A quick 15-minute charge will be sufficient.

food_stops.name: Bawarchi Biryanis
food_stops.description: Specializes in authentic Hyderabadi biryani and a wide variety of Indian dishes.

food_stops.name: Modita
food_stops.description: An upscale, Asian-inspired restaurant with a unique flair on dishes like sushi, dim sum, and noodles.

stops.soc_recommendation: Arrive with ~25% SoC. Charge to 90% for the final leg into Chicago with plenty of buffer.

food_stops.name: Taste of India
food_stops.description: A family-owned restaurant near Purdue University, offering an authentic taste of India.

rest_areas.name: I-65 Welcome Center (TN)
rest_areas.location: Mile Marker 121 on I-65 N, Tennessee
rest_areas.description: A clean and modern welcome center to stretch your legs before leaving Tennessee.

rest_areas.name: Funks Grove Rest Area (IL)
rest_areas.location: Mile Marker 149 on I-55 N, Illinois
rest_areas.description: A well-maintained rest area near Bloomington, known for its maple sirup history.

rest_areas.name: Limestone Rest Area (IL)
rest_areas.location: Mile Marker 194 on I-55 N, Illinois
rest_areas.description: A good final stop for a break before heading into the Chicagoland area.

scenic_spots.name: Louisville Slugger Museum & Factory
scenic_spots.description: A must-see for baseball fans, featuring the world's largest baseball bat and factory tours.

scenic_spots.name: National Corvette Museum
scenic_spots.description: A slight detour, but a paradise for car enthusiasts, showcasing the history of America's sports car.

scenic_spots.name: Indianapolis Motor Speedway Museum
scenic_spots.description: Home of the Indy 500, offering a close-up look at legendary race cars and the iconic track.

scenic_spots.name: Indiana Dunes National Park
scenic_spots.location: Near the southern tip of Lake Michigan, IN
scenic_spots.description: Features stunning sand dunes, beautiful beaches, and hiking trails along Lake Michigan.

kid_friendly_stops.name: Kentucky Science Center
kid_friendly_stops.description: A fantastic interactive science museum on Museum Row, perfect for curious kids to get hands-on.

kid_friendly_stops.name: The Children's Museum of Indianapolis
kid_friendly_stops.description: The world's largest children's museum. An absolute must-see with incredible exhibits, including dinosaurs and a carousel.

kid_friendly_stops.name: Fair Oaks Farms
kid_friendly_stops.description: A large-scale agricultural theme park with interactive exhibits on dairy and pig farming, plus a massive play area.
